title: Omega subgroups of powerful p-groups
description:
Let G be a powerful finite p-group. In this note, we give a short elementary
proof of the following facts for all $i\ge 0$: (i) $\exp \Omega_-i(G)\le p^i$
for odd p, and $\exp \Omega_-i(G)\le 2^{i+1}$ for p = 2; (ii) the index
$|G:G^{p^i}|$ coincides with the number of elements of G of order at most
$p^i$.
